dct_title_s: Road map of Greece / Hellēnikos Organismos Tourismou ; Dēmētrios Tsopelas. (Ancillary maps)
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading. Map is number 32, October 1972. Recto: Map shows five classes of roads, distances in kilometers, car ferry and sea cruise lines, international and domestic airports, historical sites, lodging, camping sites, beach facilities, yacht supply stations. Recto includes distance chart in kilometers showing routes with the use of ferry-boats. Ancillary map (on recto): "Map of communications in Greece" (1:4.000.000), shows railway networks, domestic air routes, seasonal domestic air routes, and domestic shipping routes. Verso: Maps show four classes of roads, distances in kilometers, railway networks, domestic shipping routes, car ferries, airports, yacht supply stations, logding, recreation, historical and other sites of interest to tourists, frontier customs houses. Verso includes locator map.
